00020 /*! \file BEDFileData.h This file defines a class to read BED files. */
00021

00023 #define _BEDFileData_HEADER_

00028 #include <cstring>

00033 namespace affxbed

00035 
00036 /*! The first word of the browser line. */
00037 #define BROWSER_LINE_START "browser position"
00038 
00039 /*! The first word of the track line. */
00040 #define TRACK_LINE_START "track name="
00041 
00042 /*! The default track name. */
00043 #define DEFAULT_TRACK_NAME "\"AFFX track\""
00044 
00045 
00046 /*! This type holds the parameters and intervals for a given group of intervals. */
00047 typedef struct _IntervalGroup
00048 {
00049         /*! The parameters for the interval group. */
00050         TagValuePairTypeList parameters;
00051 
00052         /*! The intervals. */
00053         IntervalEntryList intervals;
00054 
00055         /*! Clears the structure */
00056         void Clear();
00057 
00058 } IntervalGroup;
00059 
00060 /*! An STL list of sequence data items. */
00061 typedef std::list<IntervalGroup> IntervalGroupList;
00062 
00063 /*! An STL constant list iterator. */
00064 typedef IntervalGroupList::iterator IntervalGroupListIt;
00065 
00066 /*! Stores data associated with a BED file. */
00067 class BEDFileData
00068 {
00069 protected:
00070 
00071         /*! The file name. */
00072         std::string fileName;
00073 
00074         /*! The browser (first line of the BED file). */
00075         std::string browser;
00076 
00077         /*! The track for the bed file (second line of the BED file). */
00078         std::string track;
00079 
00080         /*! The intervals. */
00081         IntervalGroupList intervalGroups;
00082 
00083 public:
00084         /*! Constructor */
00085         BEDFileData();
00086 
00087         /*! Destructor */
00088         ~BEDFileData();
00089 
00090         /*! Clears the data in the class. */
00091         void Clear();
00092 
00093         /*! The file name.
00094          * @return The file name.
00095          */
00096         std::string &FileName() { return fileName; }
00097 
00098         /*! The browser (first line of the BED file).
00099          * @return The browser line
00100          */
00101         std::string &Browser() { return browser; }
00102 
00103         /*! The track for the bed file (second line of the BED file).
00104          @ return The track line.
00105          */
00106         std::string &Track() { return track; }
00107 
00108         /*! Format the browser string.
00109          * @param seq The sequence name.
00110          * @param start The start position.
00111          * @param stop The stop position.
00112          */
00113         void FormatBrowser(const char *seq, int start, int stop);
00114 
00115         /*! Format the track string.
00116          * @param name The track name.
00117          * @param desc The description.
00118          */
00119         void FormatTrack(const char *name="AFFX track", const char *desc="");
00120 
00121         /*! The intervals.
00122          * @return The intervals
00123          */
00124         IntervalGroupList &IntervalGroups() { return intervalGroups; }
00125 
00126         /*! Reads the entries from the file.
00127          * @return True if successful.
00128          */
00129         bool Read();
00130 };
